## Fixed

- Fixed Windows end-to-end connection failures by adding an administrator precheck before `/connect` and returning explicit `error_code` on rejection. / 通过在 `/connect` 前增加管理员权限预检并返回明确 `error_code`，修复了 Windows 端到端连接失败时反馈不清的问题。
- Fixed Windows EasyTier runtime dependency issues by explicitly shipping and extracting `Packet.dll` and `wintun.dll` alongside embedded binaries. / 通过显式打包并落盘 `Packet.dll` 与 `wintun.dll`，修复了 Windows 下 EasyTier 运行依赖缺失导致的启动失败。
- Fixed inconsistent not-found transport behavior in file APIs by standardizing `/read` and `/ls` misses to `HTTP 200` with business-level error payload. / 统一了文件接口未命中的传输语义：`/read` 与 `/ls` 在目标不存在时返回 `HTTP 200` + 业务错误 JSON。

## Changed

- Added `POST /connect` to submit base64 config and trigger remote network join without GUI paste steps. / 新增 `POST /connect`，支持直接提交 base64 配置并触发自动组网，无需 GUI 手工粘贴。
- Added binary transfer APIs `POST /upload` and `POST /download` for reliable remote package delivery. / 新增二进制传输接口 `POST /upload` 与 `POST /download`，用于稳定下发和回传文件。
- Added `timeout_sec` to `POST /exec` (default 30s, max 600s), with timeout exit code `124`. / `POST /exec` 新增 `timeout_sec`（默认 30 秒，最大 600 秒），超时返回退出码 `124`。
- Added `error_code` to `GET /health` and GUI state to improve automation-friendly diagnosis. / `GET /health` 与 GUI 状态新增 `error_code` 字段，提升自动化诊断能力。
- Updated `telehand serve` with `--config` and `--no-browser` for headless or scripted workflows. / `telehand serve` 新增 `--config` 与 `--no-browser` 参数，适配无头与脚本化场景。
- Updated local build flow to auto-fetch EasyTier assets, reducing manual environment preparation. / 本地构建流程改为自动拉取 EasyTier 依赖，减少手工准备成本。
